lessons.title: Day 8: Advanced Posture
lessons.description: Build on your posture foundation with advanced techniques and mindful movement.

steps.title: Mindful Movement
steps.text:
Advanced posture isn't just about standing straight—it's about moving with awareness. Every step, every reach, every movement affects your spinal alignment.

Key principles:
• Move with intention
• Keep your core engaged
• Align your head with your spine
• Breathe deeply and steadily

Remember: Good posture is a habit that becomes natural with practice.

steps.title: Downward Dog
steps.description: Start on hands and knees, lift hips up and back, forming an inverted V. Press through your hands and lengthen your spine.

steps.title: Plank Hold
steps.description: Hold a plank position with straight arms, body in one line from head to heels. Engage your core and breathe steadily.

steps.title: Posture Check
steps.prompt: Check your posture - shoulders back, head up!
steps.description: Mid-afternoon posture reminder to maintain good alignment.

lessons.title: Day 9: Protein Focus
lessons.description: Learn about the importance of protein for muscle growth and height development.

steps.title: Protein for Growth
steps.text:
Protein is the building block of muscles and tissues. For height optimization, aim for 1.2-1.6g of protein per kg of body weight daily.

Best sources:
• Lean meats and fish
• Eggs and dairy
• Legumes and beans
• Nuts and seeds
• Plant-based proteins

Timing matters: Spread protein intake throughout the day for optimal muscle building.

steps.title: Warrior Pose
steps.description: Step one foot back, bend front knee, arms overhead. Hold and breathe deeply, then switch sides.

steps.title: Tree Pose
steps.description: Stand on one leg, other foot on inner thigh or calf. Hands in prayer position, focus on balance.

lessons.title: Day 10: Core Strength
lessons.description: Strengthen your core to support better posture and spinal alignment.

steps.title: Core and Height
steps.text:
A strong core is essential for maintaining good posture and supporting your spine. Weak core muscles can lead to slouching and poor alignment.

Benefits:
• Better posture support
• Reduced back pain
• Improved balance
• Enhanced stability
• Better breathing

Focus on deep core muscles, not just abs.

steps.title: Bridge Pose
steps.description: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat. Lift hips up, engage glutes and core. Hold and breathe.

steps.title: Boat Pose
steps.description: Sit with knees bent, lift feet off ground, extend arms forward. Balance on your sit bones.

steps.title: Core Check
steps.prompt: Engage your core throughout the day!
steps.description: Reminder to keep your core engaged for better posture.

lessons.title: Day 11: Flexibility Focus
lessons.description: Improve your flexibility with targeted stretches for better range of motion.

steps.title: Flexibility Benefits
steps.text:
Improved flexibility leads to better posture, reduced injury risk, and enhanced movement quality.

Key areas to focus:
• Hip flexors
• Hamstrings
• Shoulders
• Spine
• Ankles

Stretch regularly but never force movements beyond your comfort level.

steps.title: Pigeon Pose
steps.description: From downward dog, bring one knee forward between hands, extend other leg back. Sink into the stretch.

steps.title: Butterfly Stretch
steps.description: Sit with soles of feet together, knees bent out. Gently press knees down and lean forward.

steps.title: Flexibility Check
steps.prompt: What's the most important rule for stretching?

lessons.title: Day 12: Deep Sleep
lessons.description: Optimize your sleep quality for maximum growth hormone production.

steps.title: Sleep Optimization
steps.text:
Quality sleep is crucial for growth hormone production. Create a sleep-friendly environment and routine.

Sleep tips:
• Keep room cool and dark
• Avoid screens 1 hour before bed
• Establish consistent bedtime
• Use relaxation techniques
• Limit caffeine after 2 PM

Aim for 8-9 hours of uninterrupted sleep.

steps.title: Legs Up the Wall
steps.description: Lie on your back with legs up against a wall. Relax completely and focus on deep breathing.

steps.title: Bedtime Routine
steps.prompt: Start winding down for quality sleep.
steps.description: Begin your bedtime routine for optimal sleep.

lessons.title: Day 13: Cardio Boost
lessons.description: Enhance your cardiovascular fitness with high-energy exercises.

steps.title: Cardio for Growth
steps.text:
Cardiovascular exercise improves circulation, boosts energy, and supports overall health.

Benefits:
• Better oxygen delivery
• Improved endurance
• Enhanced metabolism
• Stress reduction
• Better sleep quality

Mix high and low intensity for best results.

steps.title: Mountain Climbers
steps.description: Start in plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly. Keep core engaged throughout.

steps.title: Jumping Jacks
steps.description: Jump while raising arms overhead and spreading legs, then return to starting position. Repeat rhythmically.

steps.title: Cardio Time
steps.description: Time for your cardio workout to boost energy and fitness.

lessons.title: Day 14: Week 2 Review
lessons.description: Check your progress and celebrate completing two weeks of height optimization.

steps.title: Sun Salutation
steps.description: Flow through a gentle sun salutation sequence: mountain pose, forward fold, plank, cobra, downward dog, forward fold, mountain pose.

steps.title: Two Weeks Strong!
steps.text:
Congratulations on completing two weeks of height optimization! You've built a solid foundation of healthy habits.

Your progress:
• Consistent daily routines
• Improved flexibility and strength
• Better nutrition awareness
• Enhanced sleep quality
• Increased fitness levels

Keep going strong! Your dedication is building lasting results.
